name: Happy Place (DeadD3rp)
description:
You are alone in the room and only thing you got is a smartphone with some apps on it, your room is dark, broken down and scary, let's hope that the apps will help you make it your happy place.
Also You might want to play more after things get better, if they will.

Controls: Left/Right Arrow Keys - Movement
                      Space/Down Arrow Key - Phone Interaction
                       Mouse/Left Mouse Button - Other Interactions(Puzzle controls, Apps)

P.s. - You might want to use Full screen to prevent the game from scrolling the page
